channel.title: Luke R Thompson on Alexander Lab @ WHOI

item.title: Bio-GO-SHIP: The Time Is Right to Establish Global Repeat Sections of Ocean Biology
QIIME 2: Reproducible, interactive, scalable, and extensible microbiome data science
item.description: Abstract We present QIIME 2, an open-source microbiome data science platform accessible to users spanning the microbiome research ecosystem, from scientists and engineers to clinicians and policy makers. QIIME 2 provides new features that will drive the next generation of microbiome research. These include interactive spatial and temporal analysis and visualization tools, support for metabolomics and shotgun metagenomics analysis, and automated data provenance tracking to ensure reproducible, transparent microbiome data science.
